Web Banners

Everyones favorite part of the internet! WEB BANNERS! Not my favorite part of agency work but somebody's gotta do it. I even picked up the nickname "Grandmaster Flash". With the death of Flash this year, I worked to help our team navigate the path forward with HTML5 banners, by staying in the Adobe Family and using Edge Animate.
